welcome.title: Welcome to
welcome.subtitle: A new journey awaits...
welcome.legalAction: Confirm you've read and accept the

selectApps.title: Import from third-party apps
selectApps.onboardingDescription: We have detected you are using compatible third-party wallets. You can import your profiles now or do this later.
selectApps.description: Select the apps you want to import profiles from.

importProfiles.title: Import third-party profiles
importProfiles.description: Select the profiles you want to import.

errors.appIsOpen: The third-party wallet you are trying to import from is open. Please close the wallet and try again.
errors.unknown: An unknown error occurred while trying to import the profiles

shimmer.secondary: Experimental network with the latest features

custom.secondary: Connect to any network with custom settings

new.secondary: Create a new profile with a mnemonic or Ledger Nano

restore.secondary: Restore existing profile with a backup or Ledger Nano

claim.secondary: Claim staking rewards using an IOTA backup

software.secondary: Store keys in a Stronghold file with your recovery phrase

hardware.secondary: Use the keys stored on your Ledger Nano device

viewMnemonic.title: Record your recovery phrase
viewMnemonic.description: This recovery phrase is your most important secret. It is the master key to all your funds. Do not show this to anyone.

verifyMnemonic.title: Verify your recovery phrase
verifyMnemonic.description: Let’s check you wrote down your phrase correctly. Please select the word with the corresponding number below.

verifyMnemonicSuccess.title: Recovery phrase matched
verifyMnemonicSuccess.description: Remember to keep your copies private and secure

installLedger.title: Install the Ledger app
installLedger.description: Use Ledger Live to find and install the required app on your Ledger Nano device.

connectLedger.title: Connect your Ledger to Bloom
connectLedger.description: Please ensure that the official Ledger Live application is closed and follow the steps below.
connectLedger.unlock: Unlock your Ledger with its pin
connectLedger.open: Open the {appName} app on your Ledger
connectLedger.tip: Tips if your Ledger isn't connecting

ledgerConnectionGuide.title: Ledger isn't connecting?
ledgerConnectionGuide.ledgerLiveNotOpen: Ensure the Ledger Live app is not open on your computer
ledgerConnectionGuide.ledgerDeviceUnlocked: Ensure your Ledger device is unlocked with your PIN
ledgerConnectionGuide.ledgerAppOpen: Open the {appName} app on your Ledger device

mnemonic.secondary: Restore keys with a 12 or 24 word recovery phrase

file.secondary: Restore profile with a Stronghold backup file

hardware.secondary: Restore profile with a Ledger Nano device

claimFinder.title: Claim your Shimmer rewards
claimFinder.description: Use the balance finder below, and check if your Shimmer staking rewards balance is correct before claiming.

balanceFinder.title: Find your recovered accounts
balanceFinder.description: Use the balance finder below, and check if your account balances are correct before continuing.

inputMnemonic.title: Enter your recovery phrase
inputMnemonic.description: A recovery phrase is a 12 or 24 word master key to all your funds that you will have recorded when making an existing profile. Enter it below and separate each word with spaces.

importStronghold.title: Import your backup file
importStronghold.description: Drop your Stronghold backup file or choose one from the file explorer to restore your profile.

unlockBackup.title: Unlock your backup
unlockBackup.description: Please provide the password for the backup below to decrypt your keys.

encryptMnemonic.title: Secure your profile
encryptMnemonic.description: Make your password highly secure to encrypt your keys. This will be required to send tokens and assets.

enterName.title: Give your profile a name
enterName.description: Be as creative as you like! You can change this later.

enterPin.title: Add a PIN number
enterPin.description: The 6-digit PIN gives you quick entry to your profile and helps prevent unwanted access.

currency.title: Devise
currency.description: Ajuste la conversion du solde et met à jour les options du graphique

exportStronghold.title: Exporter la sauvegarde
exportStronghold.description: Exporter vers un fichier Stronghold - une sauvegarde chiffrée complète de vos portefeuilles et l'historique récent des transactions

autoLogout.title: Automatic logout
autoLogout.description: Inactivity time before your wallets lock and you are logged out

strongholdTimeout.title: Stronghold timeout
strongholdTimeout.description: Length of time before your Stronghold password is required again

ipfsGateways.title: IPFS gateways
ipfsGateways.description: Select the IPFS gateway to use for media retrieval

removeConfirmation.title: Remove IPFS gateway
removeConfirmation.description: Are you sure you want to remove this IPFS gateway?

maxMediaSize.title: Maximum media size
maxMediaSize.description: NFT media with sizes greater than this limit will not be downloaded and a placeholder representing the media type will be displayed instead

maxMediaDownloadTime.title: Temps de téléchargement maximum
maxMediaDownloadTime.description: Les médias NFT qui prennent plus de temps que cette limite à télécharger seront annulés et un espace réservé représentant le type de média sera affiché à la place

refreshNftMedia.title: Rafraîchir les NFT
refreshNftMedia.description: Les NFT mis en cache pour ce compte seront supprimés puis téléchargés à nouveau

changePassword.title: Modifier le mot de passe
changePassword.description: Votre mot de passe est utilisé pour sécuriser vos portefeuilles. Utilisez un mot de passe fort pour protéger vos fonds

changePincode.title: Modifier le code PIN
changePincode.description: Votre code PIN garde votre solde et vos transactions privées

changeProfileName.title: Modifier le nom du profil
changeProfileName.success: Vous avez modifié le nom de votre profil

hiddenAccounts.title: Hidden accounts
hiddenAccounts.description: Selecting this option will show wallets that were previously hidden

deleteProfile.title: Supprimer le profil
deleteProfile.description: Supprime l'intégralité de votre profil, de vos portefeuilles et de l'historique des transactions. Assurez-vous d'avoir une sauvegarde

deepLinks.title: Liaisons ciblées
deepLinks.description: Automatically fill transaction data in Bloom upon clicking a deep link starting with {appProtocol}://

crashReporting.title: Rapports de plantage
crashReporting.body: Help the developers improve Bloom by automatically sending diagnostic data when an error or crash occurs
crashReporting.advice: Please restart the Bloom application to {sendCrashReports, select, true {start sharing crash reports} false {stop sharing crash reports} other {apply this change}}

diagnostics.title: Diagnostics
diagnostics.description: Voir les informations du système et de l'application

troubleshoot.title: Dépannage
troubleshoot.description: Utilisez l'assistant de dépannage pour résoudre les problèmes courants

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Voir la documentation pour les explications détaillées du fonctionnement

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Consultez la FAQ pour obtenir de l'aide sur un problème commun ou une question

discord.title: Discord
discord.description: Obtenez de l'aide de la communauté IOTA sur Discord

reportAnIssue.title: Signaler un problème
reportAnIssue.description: Signaler un bug aux développeurs. Vérifiez bien qu'il n'a pas déjà été signalé

toggleFeatures.title: Enable / Disable features
toggleFeatures.description: Toggle features on or off, customize your experience by enabling or disabling specific functionalities to suit your needs.

downloadNftPermissions.title: Nft download permissions
downloadNftPermissions.description: Download permissions for the automatic downloading of NFT media

login.hintStronghold: Votre Stronghold est obsolète. Veuillez vous connecter pour le mettre à jour.

confirmLedgerEvmAddress.title: Confirmer l'adresse EVM

connectLedgerDevice.title: Connecter l'appareil Ledger
connectLedgerDevice.body: For your Ledger device to be found by Bloom, please ensure that the official Ledger Live application is closed before following these steps.

requirements.connect: Connectez et déverrouillez votre appareil Ledger
requirements.openApp: Ouvrez l'application Ethereum sur votre Ledger

configureNodeList.title: Node configuration
configureNodeList.description: Manage the list of nodes you connect to
configureNodeList.noNodes: There are no nodes, unable to connect to the network

localProofOfWork.title: Proof of work
localProofOfWork.description: Complete proof of work locally on your device or outsource to the node

contactList.title: Contact list
contactList.emptyBody: Connect with your favourite people in Bloom.

removeContact.title: Remove contact
removeContact.body: Are you sure you want to remove this contact?
removeContact.hint: Please note after removing a contact Bloom will show its actual addresses.

removeNetworkAddresses.title: Remove network addresses
removeNetworkAddresses.body: Are you sure you want to remove the contact’s {network} network addresses?
removeNetworkAddresses.hint: Please note after removing a contact’s network addresses Bloom will no longer associate it with them in transactions or activities.

paired.emptySubtitle: Connect Bloom with your favourite dApps

expired.emptySubtitle: Connect Bloom with your favourite dApps

clearExpired.title: Clear expired list
clearExpired.description: Are you sure you want to clear the list of expired dApp connections?

inputConnectionCode.title: Connect to a dApp
inputConnectionCode.addDappDescription: Add new dApps by adding a Wallet Connect code below.
inputConnectionCode.deprecated: The dApp you try to connect to uses a deprecated version of WalletConnect. Cannot establish connection

connectionRequest.title: Connection request
connectionRequest.firstTimeHint: This dApp wishes to connect for the first time. Connect to sites you trust.
connectionRequest.reconnectHint: You have previously connected with this dApp.
connectionRequest.unsupportedNetworks: This dApp is not compatible with Bloom as it runs on an unsupported network.
connectionRequest.noSupportedNetworks: This dApp is not compatible with Bloom as it runs on different networks.
connectionRequest.unsupportedMethods: This dApp is not fully compatible with Bloom. Some methods or events are unsupported.
connectionRequest.supportedOnOtherProfile: This dApp runs on a supported network, but is not accessible with this profile. Please use a profile connected to the required network.
connectionRequest.acceptInsecureConnection: I understand and wish to proceed
connectionRequest.scamHint: This domain is flagged as unsafe by multiple security providers. Leave immediately to protect your assets.
connectionRequest.invalidHint: This website is a domain that does not match the sender of the request. Approving may lead to loss of funds.
connectionRequest.unknownHint: This dApp has not been verified and may contain security risks by connecting.

permissions.tip: These are limited permissions for the dApp to send an interaction request for your approval. Only approve apps you know and trust.
permissions.empty: You have to select at least one permission
permissions.noPermissionsRequired: No permissions required to use this app

networks.tip: The required networks are pre-selected for you by the dApp and can also be reconfigured later.
networks.empty: You have to select at least one network

accounts.title: Select accounts
accounts.tip: You control what the dApp can request access for. Some apps only connect to the primary account.
accounts.empty: You have to select at least one account

disconnect.title: Disconnect
disconnect.description: Do you want to disconnect from {dappName}?

remove.title: Remove
remove.description: Do you want to disconnect from {dappName} and remove it from here?

backup.body: You haven't backed up your profile in while.

version.body: You are currently using a development version of Bloom.

update.body: A new Bloom update is available today.

gallery.title: Collectibles
gallery.emptyDescription: Deposit or receive your first collectible!

details.storageDepositDescription: A refundable deposit is required to store your NFT on the Tangle.

menu.setPfp: Définir une photo de profil NFT
menu.unsetPfp: Retirer la photo de profil NFT

collectionsGallery.title: Collections
collectionsGallery.emptyDescription: Deposit or receive your first collectible!

gallery.title: Campaigns
gallery.emptyDescription: Browse and participate in campaigns with Tide

proposals.title: Governance Proposals
proposals.successEdit: La proposition a été mise à jour avec succès
proposals.successAddAll: {numberOfProposals, select, one {Proposal} other {Proposals}} successfully added to all accounts
proposals.emptyDescription: You can subscribe to a proposal on a node with its URL and an optional event ID.

quorum.title: Quorum progress
quorum.tooltip: The quorum of 5% is defined for Tangle Treasury proposals

details.fetching: Récupération des données de la proposition
details.hintVote: Vous ne pouvez pas voter sur une proposition qui est en phase d'annonce, le vote s'ouvrira dans {time}.

projection.title: Show projected votes
projection.description: How voting might finish with current participation
projection.tooltip: The projection is based on current voting weight and remaining milestones.

update.title: Update your Stronghold
update.loginBody: Your Stronghold's version is out of date. Provide your password to update Stronghold.
update.recoveryBody: The imported Stronghold’s version is out of date, to continue we will need to update the stronghold to the latest version.

updateBackup.title: Stronghold updated
updateBackup.loginBody: It's all good now - you're running the latest Stronghold version
updateBackup.recoveryBody: You can now continue setting up your wallet
updateBackup.hint: We highly recommend to delete all previous Stronghold backup files and save a new one

changePassword.title: Change your password
changePassword.hint: Your Stronghold was out of date and has been updated. We recommend that you change your password.

info.receive: Your selected account will receive tokens directly from Transak once your payment method has been authorised.
info.multipleAccounts: If you have multiple accounts, you can switch with the account selector dropdown prior to purchase.
info.changingAccounts: Changing accounts will reset all information.

error.title: Transak could not be loaded
error.description: Please restart the app, if the issue persists please ask for support in our Discord server

enableLedgerBlindSigning.title: Autoriser la signature à l'aveugle
enableLedgerBlindSigning.info: You need to enable Blind Signing on your Ledger device to confirm this transaction.
enableLedgerBlindSigning.step_1: Connect and unlock your Ledger device
enableLedgerBlindSigning.step_3: Press the right button to navigate to Settings, then press both buttons to validate. Your Ledger device displays Blind Signing.
enableLedgerBlindSigning.step_4: Press both buttons to enable transaction blind signing. The device displays Enabled. You're done.

available.title: Disponible

unavailable.title: Unavailable

unclaimed.title: Transaction non réclamée

dappAccountSwitcher.title: Switch account
dappAccountSwitcher.body: The dApp requires you to switch to the following account. Do you want to continue?

minimizeStorageDeposit.title: Minimize storage deposit
minimizeStorageDeposit.description: Consolidate outputs to minimize your required storage deposit and increase your available balance.

password.title: Mot de passe obligatoire
password.subtitle: Veuillez saisir votre mot de passe pour déverrouiller vos portefeuilles

appUpdate.latestInstalled: Vous utilisez la dernière et la plus sûre version

backupStronghold.title: Sauvegarder votre fichier stronghold
backupStronghold.body: Il est important de sauvegarder régulièrement votre portefeuille pour vous assurer d'avoir une copie de vos portefeuilles et de l'historique des transactions. Si vous perdez votre phrase de sauvegarde et de récupération, vous perdrez l'accès à vos fonds.

deeplinkAccountSwitch.title: Select an account
deeplinkAccountSwitch.body: You just followed a deep link. Please select the wallet with which you want to continue.

deeplinkError.body: This link failed or is invalid. Please try again or double check the source of the link.

deleteAccount.title: Supprimer {name} ?
deleteAccount.body: Êtes-vous certain de vouloir supprimer ce portefeuille ?

crashReporting.body: Help the developers improve Bloom by automatically sending diagnostic data when an error or crash occurs. If selected, this will take effect after restarting Bloom.

errors.otherOwner: You're not the owner of the NFT!

noAlias.title: Unable to mint
noAlias.description: You must own an alias output to mint native tokens. To continue, please create an alias first

errors.invalidMimetype: MimeType invalide, vérifiez si le type de fichier est pris en charge
errors.quantityTooSmall: La quantité doit être supérieure à 0
errors.quantityTooLarge: Quantity needs to be smaller than 127
errors.emptyName: Le nom est un champ obligatoire

errors.notReachable: URI non joignable, impossible de vérifier le type NFT

errors.invalidRoyaltyValue: Valeur non valide, elle doit être un nombre décimal représentant le pourcentage requis i. e. 0.05

manageVotingPower.title: Manage voting power
manageVotingPower.body: Define your voting power to vote on proposals.
manageVotingPower.hint: Tous les fonds que vous allouez au vote sont bloqués. Afin de les rendre à nouveau utilisables, vous devez diminuer votre pouvoir de vote. Cela affecte toutes les propositions avec un vote actif.
manageVotingPower.amountZero: Please be aware that setting your voting power to zero will stop all your votes for all proposals you are currently voting on.

addProposal.body: Veuillez fournir les informations énumérées ci-dessous pour ajouter une proposition.

revote.title: Revoter sur les propositions
revote.body: Changing your voting power temporarily stops your votes for all proposals from being counted. Simply click "Revote" to resume voting.
revote.hint: Bloom remembers all the proposals and answer options you previously voted for.

removeProposal.title: Remove proposal

removeProposal.hint: Please note that removing a proposal during the counting period will stop your votes but won't impact any votes that have already been counted.

stopVoting.hint: Please note that stopping voting during the counting period won't impact any votes that have already been counted.

tooltips.optionalInput: This optional data will be public on the explorer and viewable by everyone.

incoming.storageDeposit: A refundable token deposit needed to store your transaction on the Tangle.
incoming.giftedStorageDeposit: The storage deposit for this transaction was gifted to you. You do not need to refund the deposit.
incoming.expirationTime: Claim these funds before the expiration time or they will be returned to the sender.
incoming.timelockDate: The sender set a timelock on these funds. You will be able to spend them once the timelock expires.
incoming.metadata: An optional data field for storing data persistently on the Tangle.
incoming.tag: A short optional data field. Tagging groups of transactions can make them easier to search for.

outgoing.storageDeposit: A storage deposit is a refundable deposit needed to store your transaction on the Tangle.
outgoing.giftedStorageDeposit: The recipient does not need to refund the deposit.
outgoing.expirationTime: If the recipient does not claim in time your tokens will be returned to you.
outgoing.timelockDate: You added a timelock to this transaction. The recipient will not be able to spend these funds until the timelock expires.
outgoing.metadata: An optional data field for storing data persistently on the Tangle.
outgoing.tag: A short optional data field. Tagging groups of transactions can make them easier to search for.
outgoing.transactionFee: The transaction fee contains the gas fee for the code execution and the storage deposit fee.

genesis.timelockDate: The sender set a timelock on these funds. You will be able to spend them once the timelock expires.

nftMetadata.type: The MimeType of the NFT. e.g. image/png.

mintNativeToken.decimals: IRC30 optional parameter: Number of decimals the token uses (divide the token amount by 10^decimals to get its user representation).
mintNativeToken.description: IRC30 optional parameter: The human-readable description of the token.
mintNativeToken.url: IRC30 optional parameter: URL pointing to more resources about the token like a website or social media page.
mintNativeToken.logoUrl: IRC30 optional parameter: URL pointing to an image resource of the token logo.

mintNftForm.royalties: Optional parameter: An object containing key-value pairs of addresses that map to payout percentages
mintNftForm.issuerName: Optional parameter: The name of the creator
mintNftForm.description: Optional parameter: A description of the NFT
mintNftForm.attributes: Optional parameter: An array of traits and values that define attributes of the NFT
mintNftForm.uri: To create a URI using custom media, first upload your file to IPFS via a storage service (e.g. https://nft.storage/)
mintNftForm.quantity: Paramètre optionnel : La quantité de copies minées avec cette métadonnée.
mintNftForm.startIndex: Optional parameter: The start index of the NFTs to mint.
